actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the unauthorized possession, within any Federal penal or correctional institution, of any substance or thing, designed to damage the institution or to injure any persons within or part of the institution.

summary.text: Prohibits the unauthorized possession within any Federal penal or correctional institution of any substance or thing designed to damage the institution or to injure any persons within or part of the institution. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 1972)

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the unauthorized possession, within any Federal penal or correctional institution, of any substance or thing, designed to damage the institution or to injure any persons within or part of the institution.
